channel.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
channel.description:
Im so confused...
I have done/coded so much for my server yet NO ONE plays... I have had maybe like 6 people online MAX. I advertise most likely everyone on top sites/webclient maker sites.. I have purchased a VPS to hosting source on. 'I have purchased custom domain.. I coded the server really good and developed the webclient..
I Just dont understand, Can someone explain to me how..? Im very confused and frustrated.

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

If you wanna talk some more, I’m always free on MSN.

I see you like old school, and I just started an old school project, so maybe we can work a bit together.

tormentedconnor@live.com

Read full topic
item.source: What does it take to have a successful server?

Allright Thanks Guys Really helped me alot.

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

You need to make your own features that some servers lack.

Random example: Working Grand Exchange

Unique things like that will catch their attention, and give it a try.

Read full topic
item.source: What does it take to have a successful server?

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Maybe people just don’t like you…idk haha but still try and make improvements with stuff even if they aren’t joining try to anyways…hope I helped u with some stuff…it is now time to watch family guy and sleep.

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

Its easy, I have money So I can care less about the VPS. I can always buy another one. Also I added a Vote4Cash xD

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Perhaps try making your own mini games .
Keep practicing your coding perhaps(even though you bought the vps maybe you should have waited haha)
Try and make a vote 4 cash or something.
Is your server easy to level and earn cash…or is it harder(I would assume easy if its a pk server)

Read full topic
item.source: What does it take to have a successful server?

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

I understand, So patience is key If Im understanding this right…
Is there any more advice you guys can give me?

@Thanks
Well let me ask you this…are you doing a revision that is popular?
Uhmm ALOT of People Enjoy the OldSkool Pk Servers, So thats what I developed. Its like Semi-OldSkool

What makes your server stand out?
To be honest… Nothing, All of It I have seen before, But How can I make it Unique when I myself arent a pro coder…

What great features do you have?
I added a Gambling System, Vote Points for a Chest, Also I edited/added alot of scripts that I ripped from other great sources.
What makes your server better then others?
Jesus, I cant answer this one…
Do you ask the people that play to advertise for you?
Yes I do, Just never seems to work.
Do you have a vote button link so people can vote for you on differen’t sites so others can see it?
Indeed I do

Read full topic
item.source: What does it take to have a successful server?

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Well let me ask you this…are you doing a revision that is popular?

What makes your server stand out?

What great features do you have?

What makes your server better then others?

Do you ask the people that play to advertise for you?

Do you have a vote button link so people can vote for you on differen’t sites so others can see it?

item.title: What does it take to have a successful server?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

-Plenty of Screenshots (Pking, Bossing, Activites, Etc.)
-Stable Economy
-Decent Combat
-Active Community

Starting a server is not easy at all. You need a LOT of patience. Once you get a good 10+ on regularly, it steadily rises from there, if you do everything right.

Read full topic
item.source: What does it take to have a successful server?
